name: Buzzle (itch)
description:
BUZZLE!

Your spaceship has crashed on planet Bodkin in the Bozolia Solar System. Get as far as you can without getting killed by Man-Eating plants or lightening.

Buzzle is a game with 3 modes: Regular, Multi Player and Mega Mode. In Regular mode you have to get as far as possible in one life, kill the monsters for bonus points. In Multi Player mode you get a mini fort on one side of the map and on the other side is your opponent, kill your opponent to win and kill the monsters for bonus points, you have 3 lives. In Mega Mode there are 1000 monsters spawned per second and you have 100,000 lives and a super powerful gun, get as far as possible! WARNING! MEGA MODE MAY CAUSE LAG.

Controls:
Forwards : Right Arrow
Back : Left Arrow
Jump : Spacebar
Shoot : Left/Right Click
(For Android version all buttons are on screen)
